name: Ruler by Default
detailed_description:
Ruler by Default is a fantasy comedy drama visual novel, played from the perspective of a 21 year old male who is inadvertently summoned to another dimension and subsequently crowned successor to an evil overlord after an unexpected twist of events.

Dimensional rifts don't just pop up every day, and forecasts predict you have a year before you can even think about going home, so you may as well get comfortable. As the overlord it will be up to you to carefully build relationships with those around you, and perhaps even put the moves on some cross dimensional characters

This game contain content such as: strong language, blood, violence

    5 Different Character routes with 42 Different Endings
    Over 150K words estimated 6-20 hours of gameplay
    50+ CGs
    Comedy, Romance, Fantasy, Drama

short_description: Ruler by Default is a fantasy/comedy/drama visual novel, played from the perspective of a 21 year old male who is inadvertently summoned to another dimension and subsequently crowned successor to an evil overlord after an unexpected twist of events.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280 x 720
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.6
  • Processor: 64 bit processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280 x 720
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: x86
  • Processor: 1 Gz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280 x 720
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
